Scripts.OnEnter: if ( self.tooltip ) then GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOP") GameTooltip:SetText(self.tooltip, nil, nil, nil, nil, 1) end
Scripts.OnLeave: if ( GameTooltip:GetOwner() == self ) then GameTooltip:Hide() end

Scripts.OnLoad:
self:RegisterForClicks("LeftButtonUp", "RightButtonUp") self.id = self:GetID() if CONQUEST_SIZE_STRINGS[self.id] then -- TEMP self.TeamSizeText:SetText(CONQUEST_SIZE_STRINGS[self.id])
self.NormalTexture:SetAlpha(1) else self:Disable()
self.TeamSizeText:Hide() self.WinsLabel:Hide() self.Wins:Hide() self.BestLabel:Hide() self.BestRating:Hide() self.CurrentLabel:Hide() self.CurrentRating:Hide()
self.NormalTexture:SetAlpha(0.7) end
self.TempLabel:SetShown(not CONQUEST_SIZE_STRINGS[self.id]) self.TempBackground:SetShown(not CONQUEST_SIZE_STRINGS[self.id])
Scripts.OnMouseDown: if ( self:IsEnabled() ~= 0 ) then self.TeamSizeText:SetPoint("CENTER", self, "LEFT", 39, 1) self.WinsLabel:SetPoint("TOP", self, "TOP", -41, -9) self.BestLabel:SetPoint("TOP", self, "TOP", 27, -9) self.CurrentLabel:SetPoint("TOP", self, "TOP", 99, -8) end
Scripts.OnMouseUp: if ( self:IsEnabled() ~= 0 ) then self.TeamSizeText:SetPoint("CENTER", self, "LEFT", 40, 0) self.WinsLabel:SetPoint("TOP", self, "TOP", -40, -10) self.BestLabel:SetPoint("TOP", self, "TOP", 28, -10) self.CurrentLabel:SetPoint("TOP", self, "TOP", 100, -9) end

Scripts.OnLoad:
if not self:GetParent().StipButton then self:GetParent().StipButton = {} end
local stripIndex = #self:GetParent().StipButton + 1 self:GetParent().StipButton[stripIndex] = self
if ( mod(stripIndex, 2) == 0 ) then self.Background:SetTexture(1, 1, 1) else self.Background:SetTexture(0, 0, 0) end

Scripts.OnClick:
if not BattlegroundsData[self.bgID].statistics.isCollapsed then self.ToggleMinus:Hide() BattlegroundsData[self.bgID].statistics.isCollapsed = true else self.TogglePlus:Hide() BattlegroundsData[self.bgID].statistics.isCollapsed = false end
RatedBattlegroundStatisticsUpdate()

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") if PVPQueueFrame.selectedCategory == 2 then GameTooltip:SetText(PVPFRAME_CURRENCY_REWARD_TOOLTIP_HEAD_CONQUEST) GameTooltip:AddLine(PVPFRAME_CURRENCY_REWARD_TOOLTIP_CONQUEST, 1, 1, 1, true) elseif PVPQueueFrame.selectedCategory == 3 then GameTooltip:SetText(PVPFRAME_CURRENCY_REWARD_TOOLTIP_HEAD_HONOR) GameTooltip:AddLine(PVPFRAME_CURRENCY_REWARD_TOOLTIP_HONOR, 1, 1, 1, true) end GameTooltip:Show()

GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") if PVPQueueFrame.selectedCategory == 2 then GameTooltip:SetText(PVPFRAME_LOOT_REWARD_TOOLTIP_HEAD_CONQUEST) GameTooltip:AddLine(PVPFRAME_LOOT_REWARD_TOOLTIP_CONQUEST, 1, 1, 1, true) elseif PVPQueueFrame.selectedCategory == 3 then GameTooltip:SetText(PVPFRAME_LOOT_REWARD_TOOLTIP_HEAD_HONOR) GameTooltip:AddLine(PVPFRAME_LOOT_REWARD_TOOLTIP_HONOR, 1, 1, 1, true) end GameTooltip:Show()

Scripts.OnShow:
local isDisabled = BattlePassFrame:GetEndTime() == 0 and not BattlePassFrame:HasNotReceivedRewards(); if isDisabled then self:GetParent():Disable() end
local textColor = isDisabled and GRAY_FONT_COLOR or NORMAL_FONT_COLOR
self:GetParent().Name:SetTextColor(textColor.r, textColor.g, textColor.b)
self:GetParent().Icon:SetDesaturated(isDisabled) self.Wreath:SetDesaturated(isDisabled) self:GetParent().Ring:SetDesaturated(isDisabled) self:GetParent().Background:SetDesaturated(isDisabled)
self.Wreath:SetAlpha(BattlePassFrame:IsBuyPremium() and 1 or 0.3)
local level = BattlePassFrame:GetLevelInfo() self.Level:SetText(level)

Scripts.OnHide:
local endButton = self:GetParent().StepEnd
endButton:ClearAllPoints() endButton:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", self:GetParent().Step2, "TOPRIGHT", 0, 0) endButton:SetPoint("BOTTOMRIGHT", -3, 3)
Scripts.OnShow:
local endButton = self:GetParent().StepEnd
endButton:ClearAllPoints() endButton:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", self, "TOPRIGHT", 0, 0) endButton:SetPoint("BOTTOMRIGHT", -3, 3)

Scripts.OnEnter: if ( self.tooltip and not ConquestFrame.NoSeason:IsShown() ) then GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(self.tooltip, NORMAL_FONT_COLOR.r, NORMAL_FONT_COLOR.g, NORMAL_FONT_COLOR.b, 1, 1) GameTooltip:Show() end

Scripts.OnShow:
self.lockBattlegrounds = C_CacheInstance:Get("ASMSG_BATTLEGROUND_LOCKED", nil)
if not self.lockBattlegrounds then self:Hide() end

Scripts.OnLoad:
local unitFaction = UnitFactionGroup("player") or "Alliance"
if unitFaction == "Alliance" then self.Background:SetTexCoord(0.00195313, 0.63867188, 0.19042969, 0.31542969) else self.Background:SetTexCoord(0.00195313, 0.63867188, 0.31738281, 0.44238281) end

Scripts.OnClick: if self:GetParent().Container:IsShown() then self:GetParent().Container:Hide() self:GetParent().StatisticsFrame:Show() self:LockHighlight() else self:GetParent().Container:Show() self:GetParent().StatisticsFrame:Hide() self:UnlockHighlight() end

Scripts.OnLoad: WhoFrameColumn_SetWidth(self, 75) self:GetFontString():SetWidth(75) --Deal with a problem of size in Russian client self.sortType = "won" self:Disable()

Scripts.OnMouseDown:
if self.Selection.AnimOut:IsPlaying() or self.AnimIn:IsPlaying() or self.AnimOut:IsPlaying() then return end
self:ClearAllPoints() self:SetPoint("CENTER", 0, 223)
